sentences.en: a new product launch
sentences.cn: 新产品的推出

sentences.en: A series of technical foul-ups delayed the launch of the new product.
sentences.cn: 一系列技术问题延误了新产品的上市。

sentences.en: A test satellite was launched from Cape Canaveral.
sentences.cn: 一颗实验人造卫星从卡纳维拉尔角发射升空。

sentences.en: Are you at the launch of the new ship?
sentences.cn: 新船下水时你在场 吗 ?

sentences.en: he launched into a two-hour sales pitch.
sentences.cn: 他发动了一场两小时的销售宣传。

sentences.en: He would soon launch a second offensive, killing off the peace process.
sentences.cn: 他不久将会再次发动进攻，彻底毁掉整个和平进程。

sentences.en: Journalists report seeing a fire on the pad after the launch.
sentences.cn: 记者们报道说在发射后看到发射台着火了。

sentences.en: she wasn't brave enough to launch out by herself.
sentences.cn: 她没有勇气独自闯荡一番。

sentences.en: The book launched his career as a novelist.
sentences.cn: 这本书开启了他的小说创作生涯。

sentences.en: The Canadian police plan to launch an investigation into the deal.
sentences.cn: 加拿大警方计划对这宗交易进行调查。

sentences.en: The company hopes to launch the new drug by next October.
sentences.cn: 公司希望于明年10月前推出这种新药。

sentences.en: The company proudly announced the launch of its new range of cars.
sentences.cn: 该公司骄傲地宣布其新一系列的轿车已投放市场.

sentences.en: The makers are about to launch out a new product.
sentences.cn: 制造商们马上要生产一种新产品.

sentences.en: The organization has launched a campaign to raise $150,000.
sentences.cn: 为了筹集15万美元，该组织发起了一场募捐活动。

sentences.en: The original planned launch was called off four minutes before blast-off.
sentences.cn: 原定的发射在点火起飞前4分钟被取消。

sentences.en: The satellite had been inactive since its launch two years ago.
sentences.cn: 该卫星自从两年前发射以来一直没起作用。

sentences.en: The two countries signed an agreement to jointly launch satellites.
sentences.cn: 两国曾签订了联合发射人造卫星的协议。

sentences.en: This Christmas sees the launch of a new games console.
sentences.cn: 这个圣诞节会有一款新型游戏机上市。

sentences.en: This morning's launch of the space shuttle Columbia has been delayed.
sentences.cn: 原定今早“哥伦比亚”号航天飞机的发射已被推迟.

sentences.en: This was enough to launch their careers into the stratosphere.
sentences.cn: 这足以让他们的事业平步青云了。

sentences.en: We'll make a trip by launch to White Island.
sentences.cn: 我们将乘汽艇到怀特岛。

sentences.en: William joined forces with businessman Nicholas Court to launch the new vehicle.
sentences.cn: 威廉和企业家尼古拉斯·考特联手推出这款新车。

sentences.en: Wimbledon has been a launch pad for so many players.
sentences.cn: 温布尔登一直是成就众多球手的地方。

words.tran_cn: 发射；发动；开始从事（launch的ing形式）
[航]发射；发行，投放市场；下水；汽艇
[航]发射（导弹、火箭等）；发起，发动；使…下水

phrases.tran_cn: 下水日期；发行日期；上市日期
发射场；发射区；活力地带（MSN的功能区之一）

trans.tran_cn: 发射，下水，上市，发起，大型汽艇
trans.tran_en: when a new product, book etc is made available or made known

trans.tran_cn: 开始从事，发起，上市，使（船）下水，发射，猛扑向前
trans.tran_en: to start something, usually something big or important

trans.tran_cn: 使下水；发射，投射；发动，发起；投放，推出；使开始从事
trans.tran_en: to start something, usually something big or important
to start something, usually something big or important
